scripts.test:e2e: pnpm test:e2e:basic && pnpm test:e2e:handlers && pnpm test:e2e:reducers
scripts.test:e2e:basic: cross-env APP_DIR=electron-example MODE=basic pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:handlers: cross-env APP_DIR=electron-example MODE=handlers pnpm run exec
scripts.test:e2e:reducers: cross-env APP_DIR=electron-example MODE=reducers pnpm run exec
